variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information: deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: ODB1
variable.description: B1. Current medication: patient used over-the-counter medications

variable.name: ODB1A1
variable.description: B1a1. Current medication: during the last month has the patient taken any aspirin?

variable.name: ODB1A2
variable.description: B1a2. Current medication: how many days during the last month has the patient taken aspirin?

variable.name: ODB1A3
variable.description: B1a3. Current medication: how many tablets of aspirin has the patient taken during the last month?

variable.name: ODB1B
variable.description: B1b. Current medication: over-the-counter- Tylenol, Advil , Motrin

variable.name: ODB1C
variable.description: B1c. Current medication: over-the-counter - cold medications

variable.name: ODB1D
variable.description: B1d. Current medication: specify - other over - the counter medication

variable.name: ODB1STP
variable.description: B1. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB2
variable.description: B2. Current medication: used vitamin/mineral or supplements on a regular basis

variable.name: ODB2STP
variable.description: B2. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB3A
variable.description: B3a. Current medication: has the patient taken non-steroidal anti-inflammatory medication during last month ?

variable.name: ODB3A1
variable.description: B3a1. Current medication: how many days has the patient taken non-steroidal anti-inflammatory medication during the last month?

variable.name: ODB3A2
variable.description: B3a2. Current medication: which medication has taken during the last month?

variable.name: ODB3STP
variable.description: B3. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB4
variable.description: B4. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken medication for pain?

variable.name: ODB4STP
variable.description: B4. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB5A
variable.description: B5a. Current medication. Female: has the patient used oral contraceptives since the last visit?

variable.name: ODB5A1
variable.description: B5a1. Current medication: how long has the patient taking oral contraceptives? (years)

variable.name: ODB5A2
variable.description: B5a2. Current medication: how long has the patient taking oral contraceptives? (months)

variable.name: ODB5B
variable.description: B5b. Current medication: has the patient taken hormone replacement therapy?

variable.name: ODB5B1
variable.description: B5b1. Current medication. Years: how long has the patient taken HTR (hormone replacement therapy)?

variable.name: ODB5B2
variable.description: B5b2. Current medication. Months: how long has the patient taken HTR (hormone replacement therapy)?

variable.name: ODB5B3
variable.description: B5b3. Current medication: does the hormone replacement therapy include a progestational agent?

variable.name: ODB5STP
variable.description: B5. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB6
variable.description: B6. Current medication: has the patient taken hormones?

variable.name: ODB6A
variable.description: B6a. Current medication: has the patient taken hormones? Specify - thyroid

variable.name: ODB6B
variable.description: B6b. Current medication: has the patient taken hormones? (glucocorticoids)

variable.name: ODB6C
variable.description: B6c. Current medication: has the patient taken hormones? Specify - other hormones (excluding thyroid or/and glucocorticoids)

variable.name: ODB6STP
variable.description: B6. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB7
variable.description: B7. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken lipid lowering medications?

variable.name: ODB7STP
variable.description: B7. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB8
variable.description: B8. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken anticoagulants?

variable.name: ODB8STP
variable.description: B8. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB9A
variable.description: B9a. Current medication: has the patient taken tranquilizers regularly?

variable.name: ODB9B
variable.description: B9b. Current medication: has the patient taken antidepressants regularly?

variable.name: ODB9STP
variable.description: B9. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB10
variable.description: B10. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken coronary vasodilators?

variable.name: ODB10STP
variable.description: B10. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB11
variable.description: B11. Current medication: has the patient taken digitalis?

variable.name: ODB11STP
variable.description: B11. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB12
variable.description: B12. Current medication: has the patient taken antihypsarrythmic medications?

variable.name: ODB12A
variable.description: B12a. Current medication: has the patient taken quinidine?

variable.name: ODB12B
variable.description: B12b. Current medication: has the patient taken procaine amide?

variable.name: ODB12C
variable.description: B12c. Current medication: has the patient taken DPH (diphenylhydantoin)?

variable.description: B12d. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken other antiarrythmic medication?

variable.name: ODB12STP
variable.description: B12. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB13
variable.description: B13. Current medication: has the patient taken ACE inhibitors?

variable.name: ODB13STP
variable.description: B13. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB14
variable.description: B14. Current medication: has the patient taken antihypertensives?

variable.description: B14a. Current medication: has the patient taken diuretics

variable.name: ODB14A1
variable.description: B14a1. Current medication: has the patient taken hydrochlorothiazide

variable.name: ODB14A2
variable.description: B14a2. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken other thiazide diuretics?

variable.name: ODB14A3
variable.description: B14a3. Current medication: has the patient taken furosemide?

variable.name: ODB14A4
variable.description: B14a4. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken other loop diuretics?

variable.name: ODB14A5
variable.description: B14a5. Current medication: has the patient taken Metolazone

variable.name: ODB14B
variable.description: B14b. Current medication: specify - has the patient taken beta blockers?

variable.name: ODB14C
variable.description: B14c. Current medication: has the patient taken Labetalol?

variable.name: ODB14D
variable.description: B14d. Current medication: has the patient taken Prazosin-like agents?

variable.name: ODB14E
variable.description: B14e. Current medication: has the patient taken Hydralazine?

variable.name: ODB14F
variable.description: B14f. Current medication: has the patient taken Guanabenz?

variable.name: ODB14G
variable.description: B14g. Current medication: has the patient taken Clonidine?

variable.name: ODB14H
variable.description: B14h. Current medication: has the patient taken Methyldopa?

variable.name: ODB14I
variable.description: B14j. Current medication: has the patient taken Minoxidil?

variable.name: ODB14J
variable.description: B14j. Current medication: has the patient taken calcium channel blockers

variable.description: B14. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: ODB15RE
variable.description: B15re. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (right eye)

variable.name: ODB15LE
variable.description: B15le. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (left eye)

variable.name: ODB15ARE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (steroid drops-right eye)

variable.name: ODB15ALE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (steroid drops-left eye)

variable.name: ODB15BRE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (glaucoma drops - right eye)

variable.name: ODB15BLE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (glaucoma drops-left eye)

variable.name: ODB15CRE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (glaucoma, dropsmydriatics, right eye)

variable.name: ODB15CLE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (mydriatics, left eye)

variable.name: ODB15DRE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: specify - has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (other ocular medication, right eye)

variable.name: ODB15DLE
variable.description: B15. Current medication: specify - has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (other ocular medication, left eye)

variable.name: ODB16
variable.description: B16. Current medication: specify - has the patient used ocular medication which require prescription? (other medications)

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified form date

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID
